title: Unfair ban for 30 minutes
body: First let me say I understand the need for banning people, as there are many people that like to trol and quit. But lately, I have been having recuring problems of game freezing on champ select. Counter keeps freezing, and finally I got  banned for 30 minutes. Since this is some kind of bug I was hoping someone could remove my ban .Ty.

replies.body: It really sounds like your network is just having some weird hiccups in its connection with our servers which keeps kicking you out of the lobby. Try switching to an ethernet connection for more stability first, but I'd take a few more troubleshooting steps to make sure everything is in order with your network settings. Check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for those basic steps!
